items.ja: 'A sour taste' - inside a summer like no other in Newcastle's history
items.en: 'A sour taste' - inside a summer like no other in Newcastle's history
items.text_for_match: 'A sour taste' - inside a summer like no other in Newcastle's history Newcastle United have had a breathless end to the transfer window after the club agreed to sell Alexander Isak and struck a deal to sign Yoane Wissa. items.ja: From 'not possible' to record spenders - Liverpool's transfer window
items.en: From 'not possible' to record spenders - Liverpool's transfer window
items.text_for_match: From 'not possible' to record spenders - Liverpool's transfer window Jurgen Klopp once suggested it was impossible for Liverpool to match their richest rivals in the transfer market. But no-one has spent more in this transfer window then they have. Jurgen Klopp once suggested it was impossible for Liverpool to match their richest rivals in the transfer market. items.ja: The player power fallout: 'Despicable' stars or 'hypocritical' clubs?
items.en: The player power fallout: 'Despicable' stars or 'hypocritical' clubs?
items.text_for_match: The player power fallout: 'Despicable' stars or 'hypocritical' clubs? After Alexander Isak and Yoane Wissa both forced moves with their behaviour, will we see an increase in players doing the same? And is it ever defensible?
